welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tielt, Belgium! This charming city is known for its picturesque streets, historic architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tielt has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lesquin Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
